definition: excite to an abnormal condition, or chafe or inflame
details:
verb
- excite to an abnormal condition, or chafe or inflame
= example: excite to an abnormal condition, or chafe or inflame
- excite to some characteristic action or condition, such as motion, contraction, or nervous impulse, by the application of a stimulus
= example: excite to some characteristic action or condition, such as motion, contraction, or nervous impulse, by the application of a stimulus
- cause annoyance in
